amendment.description: To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of funds made available to the Department of Transportation for cyber security until the Secretary of Transportation submits to Congress a detailed plan describing how the funding will be allocated and for what purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1803 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1803 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator McCain.
